snippet: That's what keeps going through my mind, even days later: how the baby would have gone first. If the firefighters had arrived later, maybe the rest of us would have been fine, but Luka would have died in his sleep.
abstract: That's what keeps going through my mind, even days later: how the baby would have gone first. If the firefighters had arrived later, maybe the rest of us would have been fine, but Luka would have died in his sleep.

headline.main: 'Wake Up Your Children. Open All the Windows.' The Dangers of Carbon Monoxide
